@josh11b Let's take a translation model with was trained offline on one machine with four 1080Ti cards as an example, the consumption time of EMA related is about 20% and this gets worse when there are more devices, which is really a huge overhead.
More specifically, there overhead include addN, AssignSubVariableOp, MEMCPYPtoP which introduced by broadcast etc. And these are where we wish to do some job to optimize.
